name: Tandemania
description:
**We recommend that players play with a 800x600 resolution in windowed mode to make the game clearer, any higher and the graphics will be blurry**

Follow a newly wed couple through their journey cycling in tandem together.

Two Xbox controllers are required to play.

Players control one side each of the quadracycle and can spam left then right trigger to push forwards on their side or spam left and right bumper to go backwards.

Respawn button is pretty buggy but if you spam it enough you will respawn correctly.
